name: RemainHours
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: remain hours
des:
Saying a future date, answer the remaining time (days, hours, mins, secs) until 0:00 of the day.
Need to set the time zone with the representative city name (default setting is London)
London(UTC), New York(UTC-4), Chicago(UTC-5), Denver(UTC-5), Los Angeles(UTC-7), Anchorage(UTC-8), Honolulu(UTC-10)

Check the time zone: which standard time is set
Set the time zone: set Chicago standard time
Say the future date: hours until tomorrow, days until October 9th
Ask the current time: what time is it
Ask the current date: what day is it
